SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.gelwins.base.logic
Class BasicRoom

java.lang.Object
  lib.util.MultiStateObject
      com.gelwins.base.logic.BasicRoom
All Implemented Interfaces:
Room
Direct Known Subclasses:
BingoLogic, KenoLogic, MixballLogic, SekaLogic, UpdownLogic
public abstract class BasicRoom
extends lib.util.MultiStateObject
implements Room

Basic class containing game logic.

Each sublass should implement four methods

main method which process user requests:

updateLobby

used to update state of the current room into the database:

Room.handleAction(com.gelwins.base.Nspace.Action, Player, com.gelwins.base.Nspace.UserActionParam)

used after each action to write the currecnt room's state into the database:

getRoomState(com.gelwins.base.Nspace.Action, Player)

used to send to the user current rooom's state:

writeState(Player, com.gelwins.base.Nspace.Action, Player, boolean)



high level API methods are making it easy to implement various game logics

getSetting(String) retreive room's setting from the database

isRoomThread() determine whether the current thread is external or worker thread

startWorker(Runnable, boolean) start's worker thread

getCurrencyId() room's currency

getJackpotType() type of the room's jackpot processing strategy

updateRoomSettings() loads the room setting from the database



low level API methods are used to log and send to the users various messages

sendGeneratorHash(Player, String) provable fair

sendGeneratorState(Player, String, int[]) provable fair

sendMessage(Player, com.gelwins.base.Nspace.Msg) chat

sendChats() chat

sendState(Player, com.gelwins.base.Nspace.Action, Player, boolean) room state

sendUserList(Player, java.util.Collection) user list
